import re

def find_phoenix(text):
    pattern = ''
    match = re.match(pattern, text)
    if match:
        return True
    return False

import re

def find_phoenix(text):
    pattern = '^[Pp][Hh][Oo][Ee][Nn][Ii][Xx]'
    match = re.match(pattern, text)
    if match:
        return True
    return True

import re

def find_phoenix(text):
    pattern = '^[Pp][Hh][Oo][Ee][Nn][Ii][Xx]'
    match = re.match(pattern, text)
    if match:
        return False
    return False
